Game: Empires & Puzzles
Account Identifier: {0}

You will be able to cancel this deletion request for up to 7 days.

The Empire you're building is intended to grow with you, and the game is implemented so that [#!]there is no true benefit in resetting your progress[#]. Empires & Puzzles has been designed to be played with one account only. You will find more useful Heroes and items when playing the game further.

[#!]Please note that it is not possible to build anything "wrong" in the game[#]. You will end up with all the possible buildings as the game progresses.

Upon submitting your deletion request, your game account and gameplay will be [#!]immediately suspended[#]. Once your deletion request has been completed, [#!]we cannot reverse it[#].

[#!]All your game progress will be lost[#], including any virtual currency or items that you've earned or purchased. We will no longer be able to assist you with refunds or other pending Support requests related to this game.

If you wish to block payments on your existing account or suspend play on your account, instead of deleting it, contact Player Support.

Please note that deleting this game account will not cancel active subscriptions. [#!]Subscriptions must be canceled through the subscription provider[#] (Apple, Google, etc.).

Deleting your account does not prohibit you from creating a new account and starting fresh in the game.
Before Deleting This Game Account, Please Consider the Following

The goal of [#!]Alliance Wars[#] is to earn points for your Alliance. This is done by defeating enemy Heroes, each defeated Hero taking your Alliance closer to victory. When the War timer runs out, the Alliance with more points wins.

Stronger enemy Heroes are worth more points when defeated. You get bonus points for defeating all the Heroes of an enemy team. Won points are never taken away, even if the player leaves the Alliance.

To participate in Wars you must setup a [#!]War Defense Team[#] during the [#!]Preparation Phase[#] before the War. You can not edit your Defense Team once a War has started.

You can attack multiple times in a War. Each attack consumes [#!]Alliance War Energy[#]. You get additional Alliance War Energy during the War.

Completely defeated Defense Teams are revived after a certain time, which increases on every defeat. You can attack enemies even if all the Heroes of your Defense Team have been defeated.

Note that you can only attack once with any specific Hero during the War. Having a large roster of powerful Heroes, and using them smartly, is the key to victory in Alliance Wars!

[#!]Assist Dragons[#] are enabled for all teams in this Alliance War. Each Dragon can be used once when attacking.

Attacking Assist Dragons are more powerful than defending Assist Dragons.

Use an Assist Dragon in an attacking team to gain [#!]{SPIRITMULTIPLIERPERCENTINCREMENT}% more Spirit Bonuses[#], [#!]{DAMAGEEFFECTMULTIPLIERPERCENTINCREMENT}% more Damage[#] and [#!]{HEALEFFECTMULTIPLIERPERCENTINCREMENT}% more Healing[#] for the next Assist Dragon that you use. 

Attacking Assist Dragons currently have {CURRENTASSISTBONUS}

Attacking Assist Dragons gain mana when shields of the respective element are matched.

Defending Assist Dragons gain a small amount of mana each turn and when Heroes of the respective element are hit.

Defeat [#!]{0} Treasure Hoarders[#] to collect an [#!]Ancient Chest[#].

Treasure Hoarders can appear in any stage. They take more damage from the fireballs of the stronger element.

The appearance rate of Treasure Hoarders is shown next to the stages and is based on the stage's difficulty.

Defeating Treasure Hoarders also awards you with [#!]Ancient Dragon Coins[#].

Treasure Hoarders stop appearing after you have defeated enough of them to collect the Ancient Chest.

You can still replay the Quest Stages for normal rewards after you have collected the Ancient Chest.

We rely on ads to keep this app free and would like to show you more personalized advertising in-game. To do so, we allow certain online advertising partners to collect information about you (e.g. profile information you provide us, your device Advertising ID and other device information). This is considered a "sale" or a "share" in certain U.S. states. We may also share your personal and video viewing information with third parties for advertising.

To opt-out of these activities, use the checkbox below. If you opt-out, you will continue to see advertisements, but they will not be as tailored to your interests.

By selecting the checkbox below, you are indicating that you do not want us to sell or share your personal information (including video viewing information) for online targeted advertising activities. You must indicate your choices again on each app and device you may use to access our Services.

Multiple purchases of the Premium Timesaver VIP extend the duration automatically. Purchases are limited to a maximum duration of {0} days.

The goal of an [#!]Alliance Quest[#] is to get a high Alliance Quest Score. Alliances with the highest Alliance Quest Scores win exclusive loot at the end of the event.

[#!]Alliance Quest Score[#] is the combined score of all players in all stages and Difficulty Tiers. Stages can be replayed for the best possible score.

The score from each stage is defined by the enemies defeated, speed of completion and the amount of Hero health left at the end of a stage. Big combos and great matches are also taken into account. Using [#!]Continues[#] has a negative effect on the stage score.

The different [#!]Difficulty Tiers[#] have limits on what Heroes, Troops and Battle Items can be used in the fights. In Alliance Quests, the harder [#!]Difficulty Tiers[#] are [#!]unlocked with the Alliance Quest Score[#].

[#!]Epic Difficulty Tier unlocks with:[#]
{0} Alliance Quest Score

[#!]Legendary Difficulty Tier unlocks with:[#]
{1} Alliance Quest Score

Only the Alliance members that joined the Alliance before the Alliance Quest started can participate.

The goal of a [#!]Challenge Event[#] is to get a high master score. The players with the highest master scores win exclusive loot at the end of the event.

[#!]Master Score[#] is the combined score of all stages within a difficulty tier. Each difficulty tier has a separate master score. Stages can be replayed for the best possible score.

The score from each stage is defined by the enemies defeated, speed of completion and the amount of Hero health left at the end of a stage. Big combos and great matches are also taken into account. Using [#!]Continues[#] has a negative effect on the stage score. It is possible that [#!]Special Enemies[#] spawn in stages. Defeating these enemies gives bonus points and awards [#!]Challenge Coins[#].

The different [#!]Difficulty Tiers[#] have limits on what Heroes, Troops and Battle Items can be used in the fights.

TIPS:

1. Using [#!]Battle Items[#] can be extremely effective in Challenge Events.

2. Some enemies in Challenge Events have an [#!]Elemental Barrier[#]. These enemies reflect all damage back from their own element.

3. Completing a difficulty tier for the first time gives a  [#!]Challenge Event Chest [#] that is not tied to the score.

Safe cleanse bypasses secondary effects, such as damage on removal, from the removed status ailment. External effects such as passive skills and family effects can still activate.
Cloned Minions inherit the same amount of HP and attack as the original Minion. The Minion will only clone if the target does not already have the maximum number of Minions or Fiends.
For dodged normal attacks, only one buff can be reallocated per turn, per Minion.
Removes even status effects and stacks that are otherwise undispellable or uncleansable.
[#!]Full Removal[#] removes all status effects, stacks and [#!]Growth[#] and [#!]Wither[#] effects. Removes even status effects and stacks that are otherwise undispellable or uncleansable.

Cloned Fiends absorb the same amount of healing and deal the same amount of damage as the original Fiend. The Fiend will only clone if the target does not already have the maximum number of Fiends or Minions.
Ignores heal steal, healing modifiers and Fiends.

[%140][##elementpurple]Basics[#][%]
The goal of [#!]Monster Island[#] is to earn points for your Alliance. 

This is done by 
[*] Exploring the Island 
[*] Defeating monsters (Hordes and Apex)
[*] Opening Chests (Relic and Treasure chests)

When the event timer runs out, the Alliance will receive rewards based on the amount of Chests opened and the Alliance Score rank on the leaderboard. (Please note that the rewards might change before the official release.)

Alliances are assigned an event difficulty based on their [#!]Titan[#] performance. Each difficulty has a different leaderboard and the value of rewards increase with higher difficulties.

[%140][##elementpurple]Campsite[#][%]
You begin your adventure from the [#!]Campsite[#] Area. You can edit your Team and Items only in the Campsite Area. Items consumed in battles are refilled when returning to a Campsite.

[%140][##elementpurple]Energy[#][%]
Moving and attacking enemies consumes [#!]Monster Island Energy[#]. Attacking the same enemy has an increased Energy cost. Energy is replenished by [#!]{0}[#] in fixed intervals.

[%140][##elementpurple]Monsters[#][%]
On Monster Island you can engage in two different types of battles:

[*] [#ff6666]Apex Monsters[#]: Powerful monsters with a large amount of Health. Damage done to them persists between attacks. Apex Monsters only drop Treasure chest keys.

[*] [#ffaa66]Monster Hordes[#]: Battle against a Horde of multiple monsters. Several attacks are needed to defeat all enemies. How fast each Horde is defeated will affect scoring. After a Horde is defeated, another one will take its place after a certain period of time. Hordes have higher chance of dropping Relic chest keys.

[%140][##elementpurple]Chests[#][%]
There are many secret treasures to be found on Monster Island. Find Chests on the map to boost your Heroes and unlock rewards.

There are two types of Chests:

[*] [#66ff66]Treasure Chests[#] contain loot that will be randomly distributed to all members of your Alliance at the end of the event.

[*] [#ffff00]Relic Chests[#] contain Relics that buff all your Alliance members' Heroes.

Chests are unlocked with [#!]Treasure and Relic Chest Keys[#]. All Apex Monsters and some Monster Hordes drop Chest Keys when defeated. Collected Keys are shared with the whole Alliance and anyone can use them to unlock chests.

[%140][##elementpurple]Event Battle Rules[#][%]
{1}

[##elementred]Increased Damage Against Minions: [#]
Monsters deal more damage against Heroes that have Minions.

[##elementred]Adjusted Boosted Healing[#]:
All [#!]boosted healing[#] is received as [#!]normal healing[#] in the event. Heroes' Health cannot exceed their maximum Health.

[%140][##elementpurple]Event Bonuses[#][%]
Heroes of the [#!]Plains Hunter[#], [#!]Abyss Hunter[#], and [#!]Jungle Hunter[#] families receive a [#!]Monster Island Bonus[#] in the Monster Island event! The Heroes receive [#!]increased attack, defense and health[#] as well as a [#!]reduction to the amount of permanent damage[#] they receive in battles. Their Special Skills also become empowered, casting an [#!]extra ailment[#] to all enemies.

Exploring the island wisely, buffing your Alliance with relics and having a large roster of powerful Heroes is the key to success on Monster Island!

[#!]Raid battles also have extra rules[#]:

[*]Troop damage gains an additional [#!]strong damage bonus[#] against the weak element. 

[*]However, this additional Raid-specific bonus decreases slightly if you have more Heroes of the same element in your team. 

[*]Troop damage always has a chance to deal [#!]a critical hit[#]. Critical chance can be increased by status effects and other means.

[*]In addition to dealing more damage, [#!]Troop critical hits also decrease the target's max health[#], making them easier to defeat.

After each attack, both players' [#!]Trophies[#] will change depending on their Trophy difference and their teams' performance.

Use Raid Energy to initiate Raid battles!

In Raid battles your attack team will challenge an opposing player's defense team. 

[#!]Raid battles follow most normal gameplay rules[#]:

[*]Damage you deal with tile matches (Troop damage) is stronger when you have elemental advantage.

[*]Troop damage increases if you have more Heroes of the matched element on your team.

[*]Tapping a specific enemy during battle allows you to target them with Special Skills.

[#!]Eldritch Power[#]

How does [#!]Insanity[#] work?
[*][#!]Insanity[#] adds a chance of reversing the targeting of a Special Skill.
[*]When [#!]Insanity[#] activates, Special Skills that target enemies instead will target allies, and vice versa.
[*]Special Skills aimed at a caster will be cast on a random target. Special Skills aimed at a target will be cast on the caster.
[*]When [#!]Insanity[#] activates, Passive Skills that grant extra effects on cast won't activate.
[*]Reaching 100 [#!]Insanity[#] automatically casts a Special Skill when mana is full.
[*][#!]Insanity[#] cannot be dispelled, cleansed or resisted.

How to deal with [#!]Insanity[#]?
[*]Hero's [#!]Insanity[#] can be lowered by {INSANITYREDUCTIONONHEAL} each time they are healed directly by Special Skills, Items or Tiles. Direct heals from Special Skills lower [#!]Insanity[#] only once per cast.
[*]Healing provided by Status Effects, Passive Skills, Minions and other secondary effects does not lower [#!]Insanity[#].
[*][#!]Insanity[#] is completely removed when a reversed Special Skill is cast.

[#!]Charged Eldritch Sign[#]: All Heroes receive {MATCHEFFECTFIXEDPOWER} HP.

Watchers [#!]reduce any damage that would be dealt to the Titan[#] by taking a fraction of it themselves.

Watchers cannot be prevented from being summoned and trying to steal a Watcher will kill it instead.

Each [#!]completed battle in the War of the Three Kingdoms[#] grants you Red Lucky Coins, regardless of scoring.

The [#!]end rewards of the War of the Three Kingdoms[#] are based on individual and Warband scoring. The end rewards are distributed in four different categories:

1. You gain rewards based on the outcome of the Skirmish. You gain extra rewards if your Warband wins the Skirmish.

2. You also gain rewards based on your own performance in your Warband.

3. Combatants of the Kingdoms with the most victorious Warbands gets extra rewards.

4. Combatants of the Warbands with the most [#!]Warband Score[#] in a Kingdom get extra rewards. The stronger enemies your Warband defeats, the more points and [#!]Warband Score[#] your Warband gains.

The goal of [#!]War of the Three Kingdoms[#] is to earn points for your [#!]Warband[#].

You will battle in a [#!]Skirmish[#] against an enemy [#!]Kingdom's[#] Warband. You gain points by defeating enemy Heroes. When the War timer runs out, the Warband with more points wins.

Stronger enemy Heroes are worth more points when defeated. You get bonus points for defeating all the Heroes of an enemy Warband.

You can attack multiple times during the Skirmish. Each completed battle rewards you with [#!]Red Lucky Coins[#] regardless of points gained.  Each attack consumes one [#!]Three Kingdoms War Energy[#]. You get additional Three Kingdoms War Energy during the Skirmish.

Completely defeated Defense Teams are revived after a certain time, which increases on every defeat. You can attack enemies even if all the Heroes of your Defense Team have been defeated.

Note that you can only attack once with any specific Hero during the Skirmish. Having a large roster of powerful Heroes, and using them smartly, is the key to victory in War of the Three Kingdoms!

Heroes of the [#!]Kingdom[#] and [#!]Journey[#] families as well as Heroes fighting alongside them receive a [#!]Morale Boost[#] in Wars of the Three Kingdoms! Heroes with a Morale Boost receive [#!]increased attack, defense, and health[#] in battles.

The Goblin Balloon stores the Goblin Crates that you have found. It appears only when you have Goblin Crates.

Fill all 5 slots of the Balloon and you'll get an extra item from the Mystery Crate when you purchase the stored items!

When all 5 slots of the Balloon are full, you cannot collect any more Goblin Crates.

If the Balloon storage is full, you can also recycle the stored items for a small amount of loot.

You must open the Goblin Crates before their contents can be purchased or recycled.

Occasionally a [#!]Royal Goblin Balloon[#] will appear, and will contain better rarity Goblin Crates.

Use Raid Energy to initiate Raid battles!

In Raid battles your attack team will challenge an opposing player's defense team. 

[#!]Raid battles follow most normal gameplay rules[#]:

[*]Damage you deal with tile matches (troop damage) is stronger when you have elemental advantage.

[*]Troop damage increases if you have more heroes of the matched element on your team. 

[#!]Raid battles also have extra rules[#]:

[*]Troop damage gains an additional [#!]strong damage bonus[#] against the weak element. 

[*]However, this additional Raid-specific bonus decreases slightly if you have more heroes of the same element in your team. 

[*]Troop damage always has a chance to deal [#!]a critical hit[#]. Critical chance can be increased by status effects and other means.

[*]In addition to dealing more damage, [#!]troop critical hits also decrease the target's max health[#], making them easier to defeat.

After each attack, both players' [#!]Trophies[#] will change depending on their Trophy difference and their teams' performance.

Hero League is a competitive game format where you Raid for glory and survival in a month-long League.

Each League runs for {0} rounds. At the end of each round, {1}% of players with the lowest score are eliminated. Battle other players to reach the final round!


[#ffffff]FEATURED FAMILIES & CLASSES[#]

Each Hero League has a selection of Featured Families. Heroes belonging to these Families receive [##elementgreen]Advantages[#], making them stronger in various ways. 

Likewise, Heroes from families that are NOT Featured receive [##elementred]Disadvantages[#] which hinder them in battles.

There are also [#!]Featured Classes[#]. Heroes of these Classes receive a small boost to their stats. The Featured Classes vary between rounds.

More details on Featured Families and Classes can be found in the [#ffffff]BONUSES[#] tab!


[#ffffff]REGISTRATION PHASE[#]

Register for the League and prepare your Defense Team!

You can only register for the League during the Registration Phase. You can still edit your Defense Team once the League has started.

The Registration Phase lasts for {2}.


[#ffffff]BATTLE PHASE[#]

Earn points by conducting attacks. A maximum number of attacks can be done each day, the number of attacks changes from round to round:

{3}

Your score is affected by a number of factors, such as whether you won, how many enemy Heroes you managed to defeat and how well you matched shields during the battle.

At the end of each round, players also receive Defense Team Points based on their Defense Team's performance.

One Battle Phase lasts for {4}. Each League has {0} Battle Phases, one for each round.


[#ffffff]COOLDOWN PHASE[#]

All players are unable to battle during this Phase. {1}% of all registered players with the lowest score from the previous round are eliminated. Eliminated players cannot play in the following rounds.

Cooldown Phases occur between rounds. One Cooldown Phase lasts for {5}.

[#ffffff]REWARDS[#]

Loot is received when you are eliminated OR at the end of the League (if you have reached the last round).

Your Round Loot tier is determined by the last Round you reached, and your Ranking Loot tier is determined by your final rank. The final rank is determined by your final score.

As in other events, players receive only the rewards from the highest loot tier they belong to.

[#!]PLEASE NOTE:[#]  Rewards shown in this Beta round are placeholders and do not reflect the rewards that will be awarded in the final version of this feature.

[#!]FEATURED CLASS STAT BOOST:[#]

Heroes of the Featured Classes get a boost to their stats (Attack, Defense and Health).
[#!]{0}[#]
Featured Families and Featured Classes will be listed in this section when the League begins.
[#!]PLEASE NOTE:[#]  Rewards shown in this Beta round are placeholders and do not reflect the rewards that will be awarded in the final version of this feature.

[#ffffff]GUEST HEROES[#]

Each Hero League has a selection of Guest Heroes from the Featured Families that will assist you through League rounds. Guest Heroes are donated upon Registeration and are only available in this League.

At the end of each round, players receive Defense Points based on their Defense Team's performance.

If you don't perform any attacks during this round, you will receive 0 points from your Defense Grade.

[#!]Victory Bonus[#] - Whether you won or lost the battle

[#!]Enemy Heroes defeated[#] - How many enemy Heroes you managed to defeat during the battle

[#!]Battle Bonus[#] - The amount of 4- and 5-shield matches made and the size of the highest combo performed

[#!]Speed Bonus[#] - If you finish the battle before {0} moves, you will get up to {1} points for defeating your opponent quickly.

Raid Tournaments are Raids with Special Rules that change every week. You will receive rewards based on your raiding skills.


[#ffffff]PREPARATION PHASE[#]

The Preparation Phase lasts for one day. During the Preparation Phase you prepare your Defense Team. The Defense Team cannot be changed after the Preparation Phase has ended.

You will receive Defense Points at the end of each Battle Day. The amount of points depends on the performance of your Defense Team. You can only use Defense Teams that match the Tournament rules.


[#ffffff]BATTLE PHASE[#]

The Battle Phase lasts for 5 days. You have 5 attacks each day. Each opponent has a Difficulty Bonus that is determined based on the performance of their Defense Team compared to your previous attacks. You can only use Attack Teams that match the Tournament rules.

If your attacks result in a Defeat for 4 times, you are Defeated and cannot continue in this Raid Tournament. You can use Gems to reset your Defeats and continue. Your Defense Team will still get Defense Points even after you have been Defeated.


[#ffffff]LOOT[#]

Your final Score determines your Loot Tier. You get rewards only from the highest Loot Tier that you belong to. The reward Loot is given shortly after the Battle Phase ends.

Bonefang is known for his bloodthirst. This fast, unchained behemoth loves to inflict fear in others and to decorate himself with his fallen enemies' bones.
This fearsome fire dragon is known by few. He only keeps to himself and rarely leaves his home, Mount Fury. Rumors say that a volcano erupts whenever you hear his roar.
Mordax, the terror of Hermit's Bay, is known for his endless appetite. Rumors say that he can grow an infinite number of heads if one is lost.
An ancient dragon that is rumored to fly among the stars. The origin of this dragon has remained a mystery.
Terrorclaw is known for terrorizing the Slumbering Gorge. This vicious dragon loves to shred his enemies with his long and sharp claws.
No one knows the true power of Ursena, but in the old stories she has almost limitless power.

There is a prophecy among the inhabitants of Muspelheim that on the dawn of Ragnarok, Surtur will wield his flaming sword, shining brighter than the sun, and engulf the world in flame. Finally, he will give his people a world they have hoped for from the ashes of the one they could never inherit.

The first of the Ice Giants, Ymir reigns over Jotunheim as their supreme leader. No mortal has survived him to tell of his powers, but stories of him are littered with conflict and terror and spoken in tones of reverance and fear.

The World-Eating Serpent, the One Who Strikes With Malice, the Shredder of Bodies. No one has ever dared to deny him his prize, and the only punishment fit for the crime of taking the Nine Realms from his grasp is the final end for all of them. It seems Ragnarok has finally come.

Once celebrated for his groundbreaking scientific discoveries, all that remains of a great mind is now but a marionette dancing to the Demiurge's song. But though he has lost his free will, the power he has received in return is nothing to balk at. In the old stories, vessels of Demiurge have acted as conquerors of worlds and even slayers of rival gods...

Once a protector of the people of Kemyth, Set became shunned after the rise of Horus. Suffering decades of blasphemy, Set slowly became unrecognizable. A vicious and spiteful creature.

Now the scuffle of the two deities has once again brought turmoil to the world. Though the gods might know not of good and evil, there is only one way to end the conflict and stop the suffering of many ‚Äî defeat Set, this time for good.
The Temple Keeper of the Deep makes his final stand serving his master. Ultrox thirsts for revenge. He wishes to obliterate the heroes for defeating Ursena.

An eternal being worshipped by many in the darkest depths below Atlantis. In long forgotten legend, Domiventus is believed to be an incarnation of a singularity born from the end of time.

Gestalt's mad quest for perfection makes him believe that allowing Domiventus to devour the world would unite everyone in endless darkness. Thus ridding the world of the imperfections of individuality and chaos.

The mad prince of the Eternal Deep and the tyrant enslaving the depths below Atlantis. The corruption he spreads binds all minds under the will of Domiventus.

Time is running thin for Elena as Gestalt begins summoning Domiventus ‚Äî it is time to defeat Gestalt before all is lost.

After retreating deep into his sanctum, Fafnir transformed by his own greed into a great serpent. He stands tall atop the dwarven king Hreidmarr's treasures, overflowing with corruption.

In this accursed form Fafnir waits for the right time to conquer all the realms of the gods, elves and humankind.

Lifts all cleansable status ailments that affect attack or defense from all allies and randomly distributes them on enemies.
Deals an additional {DAMAGE}% damage to {MAXHITS} random enemies.
If all allies currently on the battlefield have attack buffs, the damage will increase to {POWER}% and it will affect all enemies.

The damage and the amount of enemies targeted will increase based on ally attack buffs:
[*]If at least {COUNTREQUIREMENT} allies currently on the battlefield have attack buffs, the damage will increase to {POWER}% and it will affect nearby enemies.
Defeated allies are not considered to be on the battlefield.

If the target has buffs and is hit, targets another enemy with buffs. If none of the other enemies have buffs, targets a random enemy. The damage is reduced on each consecutive hit. Each enemy can only be hit once.
The attack will always bypass counterattacks and reflection.
The attack has a {BYPASSCHANCE}% chance to bypass defensive buffs.
The attack chains through all the enemies who are adjacent to any hit enemy.
The attack chains through all the enemies who are adjacent to any hit enemy and deals minor damage.

Extra damage is based on the modifed attack on caster when damage is dealt.
[*]Up to maximum [#!]{MAXFIXEDPOWER}[#] additional extra damage.

[*]Defense stat does not affect the extra damage.

[#!]Growth Boon:[#] Deals [#!]{FIXEDPOWERPERBASESTAT}x[#] extra damage for each point of modified attack.
[#!]Growth Boon:[#] Recovers [#!]{FIXEDPOWERPERBASESTAT}x[#] extra health for each point of modified defense.

[#!]Starter Challenges[#]
Starter Challenges are active until completed. Starter Challenges are Tiered: completing all challenges in a tier will reveal the next Tier of Challenges.

[#!]Starter Points[#]
Challenges give you Starter Points. Starter Points are needed to reach [#!]Milestones[#] on the Starter Path.

[#!]Milestones[#]
Each Milestone can have [#!]Normal Rewards[#] and [#!]Premium Rewards[#] for you to collect. [#!]Premium Rewards[#] are only available for the players with an active [#!]Starter Pass[#].

Complete [#!]Starter Challenges[#] to earn [#!]Starter Points[#].

Accumulating [#!]Starter Points[#] lets you reach [#!]Milestones[#] and unlock fantastic rewards.

You still need [#!]{0} Starter Points[#] to reach the next [#!]Milestone[#].
Guest Heroes will help you during [#!]Starter Quest[#]! At each difficulty tier a new team of powerful Heroes will assist you in your adventure.
Please enjoy playing with a team of [#!]Guest Heroes[#], Troops and items that will help you during [#!]Starter Quest[#].
You must complete all Epic levels before you can proceed to the Legendary levels.
Can't be edited in Starter Quest
You must complete all Rare levels before you can proceed to the Epic levels.

The goal in [#!]Starter Quest[#] is to finish all levels and get a high master score. The higher the master score ranks on the leaderboard, the better the loot.

[#!]Master Score[#] is the combined score of all quest stages in all difficulty tiers.

The score from each stage is defined by the enemies defeated and the amount of Hero health left at the end of a stage. Big combos and great matches are also taken into account.

Each [#!]Difficulty Tier[#] features a set of powerful [#!]Guest Heroes[#] that will assist you in your adventure.

The time is nigh for the Clash of Knights.
The winners shall rule the castle as they wish...
...and the losers must obey their rules!
But only until the next Clash takes place!
The Wolf Knights and the Raven Knights look at each other. Suddenly more knights appear from the forest.
The Stag Knights are here to challenge you!
We are the Bear Knights! All brave champions hear me! Raise your blades to begin the fight!
..for the Clash of Knights to begin!
Great! Time to arrange a feast!
Such a shame... Their treasure would have been a great addition to my collection.
I sense an unknown presence in our forest...
Hmm, interesting! Have they got any treasure?
Chunkyroi, you need to focus. We might have to defend our forest.
Almost as beautiful as the treasure I smell on you!
Hey! Are you saying I smell?
There is an entrance fee for entering our domain. The fee is... all the treasure you have.
How about we fight instead? If we lose, we agree to the payment.
But if we win, we are allowed to pass for free, and you will host a feast for us!
I like the way you think. Pepperbleu! Let's show them the power of Moths!
Delightful! I did not expect your choice of blades to match up so well against the rapier and main-gauche.
My horizons have certainly widened. It was a rare pleasure to face off against such a foreign style.
Same on my end. It's not every day I get to match blades with blades, and you four are definitely no pushovers.
I guess hammers aren't in fashion in these parts! A bit disappointing, that.
You'd be hard-pressed to find one of that shape and size. A halberd, perhaps; but a hammer, probably not.
I am loathe to cut this meeting short, but friends, we must not tarry. That diabolical villainess is still on the loose.
Understood. Please excuse our haste. If we are to meet again in the future, let us duel once more ‚Äî amiably.
Farewell, valiant travellers! May our paths ‚Äî and blades ‚Äî cross again!
Halt, strangers! Sheathe your weapons and declare your affiliation.
Um, sorry? Who are you people?
Are you not aware of where you are passing through? Surely you are not feigning ignorance of the musketeers?
Sorry, we're just travellers. And no, that name doesn't really ring a bell.
Outrageous. Friends, I daresay these two so-called travellers are far too suspicious and well-armed to just let by.
Let us swiftly disarm and dispose of these scoundrels. We have little time to spare in our pursuit of Milady.
It is an utmost priority to maintain peace in the Ancient Underroot. Now begone, Terrorclaw!
This is not the last time you hear of me, Saestrasz!
One day, I will claim the riches of the Underroot!
The Ancient Underroot... It has been hidden for hundreds of years.
Legends say there is ancient treasure here.
Saestrasz! How did you find this place?
The riches of the Underroot are mine!
Terrorclaw! I should have known that you are here.
We will not let you corrupt this place. Commander, prepare for battle!
Amazing show! Humans are always so full of energy.
It is always refreshing to have such lively visitors.
It's always fun to face an awesome challenge!
Please, you may visit us any time you like.
This place is amazing! I never expected to find myself in a place like this.
Hello humans! I am Starwalker, king of the Astral Elves.
Gaze upon the plane where galaxies sleep.
It is rare to receive humans as visitors.
You must have great power to have found the astral plane.
As a matter of fact, I would like to test your power. Care for a friendly challenge?
How about it Richard? If you were to face the king of the Astral Elves, would you lose?
Yeah, these should help us in oncoming battles.
We should search these ruins for items...
We found all kinds of things today. Let's put them to good use!
The old battlegrounds here are full of valuable items. Let's drive the monsters away and see what we find!
That was a lot of fun! Hey, Mortimer, your team put up a good fight.
I can't believe that my team lost. Flip is a certified professional water balloon champion!
I didn't want to scare you earlier, but Flip is the reigning water balloon fight grandmaster.
Oh, now I understand why it was so difficult. Flip is the best!
Don't worry about it too much, it was a fun competition. Let's get on with the party!
Sounds fantastic. There is unlimited ice cream for everyone!
This beach party looks great! Thanks for inviting us, Mortimer!
No problem, Misty. I'm glad you could join us.
What's the main event this time? Why are there water balloons everywhere?
We have prepared a water balloon fight. It's going to be massive. You're welcome to join!
That sounds like a lot of fun. My friend, Flip, is really good at slinging water balloons!
I want to see Flip sling those water balloons! The competition is ON!
Now, we must start preparing for next year's challenge.
But first, let's enjoy our holiday feast!
I'm adding some finishing touches to make the snowmen extra frosty!
And I'm testing a pinch of cinnamon to spice up the hot chocolate!
All the feast decorations are done.
Boss! We are ready to hit the slopes.
Well done everyone! It's time to show our guests a jolly good time!
Your accomplishments in wizardry are commendable. I, Ulmer, declare you victorious!
Only I have the authority to declare things here! I, Balthazar, declare you victorious!
I, Ulmer, am the most accomplished Wizard here. I welcome you to the Trials of Decimation.
Don't listen to that fool. I, Balthazar, am the most accomplished Wizard here! Let the Trials begin!
You are strong as an oak. Great work Commander!
You must be unyielding to pass this trial.
It is time to start the Trials of Fortitude!
You wield bow with accuracy and grace. Well done Commander!
Archery is all about concentration and breath control.
Please join me in the Trials of Serenity!
You have proven yourself, Commander. Farewell.
Commander, it is time to prove that you are virtuous. Welcome to the Trials of Justice.
Great work! The golems have been dealt with!
It's dangerous up ahead! One of my experimental golems got loose!
Let the Trials of Mysticism begin!
Commander, you clearly are one with the nature. Safe travels!
This forest offers many challenges. Welcome to the Trials of Nature.
Commander, you are an inspiration to us all! Impressive work!
Let's measure your devotion in the Trials of Piety, Commander!
Well well, look who made it through. Not bad.
Alright hotshot, let's see if you can beat the Trials of Shadows.
Nashgar not strong enough to crush Commander. Commander good!
Nashgar is really excited about the Trials of Strength! Good luck Commander!
You're tougher than you look Commander.
You have our respect... for now.
Do you think you are a match for the Trials of Survival?
Come on Azlar, let's show them a real challenge.
Hmm... Those bandits sure had some silly Costumes...
But look at you! What a transformation!
I'll take that as a compliment!
Welcome to the Masquerade! This is a...
You don't have a Costume either!
Aha! Those masked bandits must have taken them!
Let's get the Costumes back, Commander!
Unimaginable! You are still on your feet.
You have well-earned our respect, and your passage forward.
May your journey be filled with great challenges.
Have you ever seen a land like this? Ice and fire, both withstanding each other!
If the land itself shows such a great persistence, I wonder what lies ahead of us...
That would be the Covenant of Champions!
A place for the most exceptional warriors, as only rare few are honored with our membership.
Which is why I cannot let any ordinary travelers wander around here.
Oh! But now that I look at you, something tells me you have seen a battle or two. Hmm...
Here is the deal! You must earn your passage through this land by fighting our Champions!
Now, which weapon would you prefer?
Unimaginable! You are still on your feet.
You have well-earned our respect, and your passage forward.
May your journey be filled with great challenges.
Have you ever seen a land like this? Ice and fire, both withstanding each other!
If the land itself shows such a great persistence, I wonder what lies ahead of us...
That would be the Covenant of Champions!
A place for the most exceptional warriors, as only rare few are honored with our membership.
Which is why I cannot let any ordinary travelers wander around here.
Oh! But now that I look at you, something tells me you have seen a battle or two. Hmm...
Here is the deal! You must earn your passage through this land by fighting our Champions!
Now, which weapon would you prefer?
Make sure to put the materials to good use!
These woods are abundant with materials we can use for crafting.
The mission is completed, we got a good haul of materials from here. Let's return home.
Our heroes and forges are in constant need of new equipment and materials. Let's see what we can find from here.
And so it happened like the stars foretold. Use these items well.
The stars have foretold: You will find many items tonight, should you venture further into the night skies.
Thank you! We should train them to grow into great Dragons!
Dragonlings have escaped into the night! Please find and rescue them!
Are you going to eat those or use them to expand the Dragonspire?
This river is filled with Dragonstone and Fish. Help me catch the delicious fish!
You endured well. May the warm dragon fire light your way!
Welcome to the ice-cold Sapphire Cavern. Be careful not to freeze up!
The rumors were true! Use it wisely.
The Rainbow Cavern is rumored to hold a chalice containing the powers of all five elements. Let's be careful!
You claimed the pendant! Use its power carefully.
The sentinels of this cavern are said to guard the Dragonstone Pendant. Prepare yourself well!
The power of nature is impressive, right? Well fought.
This is the fabled Jade Cavern. It holds the power of nature. Stay on your guard!
You did well! Holy Dragons are strong against the Dark Dragons.
This cavern radiates with dark energy. Be careful that it won't consume you!
Well done, you prevailed well against the test of fire.
The rubies here are sharp as thorns. Be careful, as the cuts burn like fire!
Well fought. These items are great for Dragon Ascension.
Did you know topaz has some cleansing qualities? Prepare yourself!
That was a tough battle. I was barely able to beat you.
You have trained well. Last time we met, you weren't this powerful.
Since you have bested us, here is a Legendary Dragon Token. You can use it to summon new allies.
Thank you, Lux! This will help me a lot!
My pleasure. Now, travel safely, Blaze.
Hello, Blaze. I hope you have been well since we last met.
It's been quite rough recently. I am looking for new allies, but nobody wants to join my party.
I see. Would you like to challenge me and my companions? If you win, I will give you a reward that will help you.
Ancient Knowledge of Dragons is power. Use it well!
Ancient knowledge of Dragons is hidden deep within this cave. Stay alert, as there might be guardians protecting the cave!
Great! I knew you could do it!
Springvale Festival is the best! It was awesome that you could join us!
The Springvale Festival is about to begin! Let's go!
Jack, would you let this rookie join so easily?
Well... The more the merrier, right?
We'll see if they can manage... This festival is not for rookies!
The ice warriors just refuse to stay down... if we slay one, it eventually gets back up again.
We stopped them for now, though. I wonder if this is the last we've seen of them...
The people in this region firmly believe that an unnatural winter is coming.
Look out! Icy warriors are emerging from the blizzard, hungry for fight!
The attack was a success! We've scattered the vile forces far and wide, and it'll take a good while for the enemies to regroup.
This remote mountain pass serves as a main transport route for armies of evil. We can slow down their operations with a surprise strike here!
The attack was a success! We've scattered the vile forces far and wide, and it'll take a good while for the enemies to regroup.
This remote mountain pass serves as a main transport route for armies of evil. We can slow down their operations with a surprise strike here!
The guardian beasts had been corrupted by the Dark Lord... and we had no choice but to stop them.
The residents of the forest appreciate our help. We may even later get the permission to explore the lost ruins of the forest!
Shrikewood... the forest has been forbidden for outsiders for ages. It's said to be guarded by mighty beasts.
We've received a plea for help from within... it may be a trap, but it's our duty to do what we can!
The vampire lord has been driven away. It was kind of easier than I expected, though.
I wonder if there's a Vampire King somewhere, ruling above all the lords? Or maybe a Vampire Queen? Maybe we'll find out someday!
Morlovia! A country full of cemeteries, mist and ruined castles. How charming!
Why am I not surprised to learn that a vampire lord has been sighted here? Let's stop him before he causes more harm!
The dragon was about to ignite the entire volcano! We stopped it at the last minute!
The volcano is quiet for now... but I don't think this is the last we've seen of dragons here.
This volcano has been dormant for hundreds of years... but something has activated it, threatening nearby lands!
I bet my boots that a dragon of some kind is behind this. Let's investigate!
Yes, we've found a well-hidden oasis amidst the sandy dunes!
We can rest at the oasis if we ever decide to explore further into this vast desert.
It's very dry here, not a drop of water anywhere to be found. But the area is also swarming with monsters...
There must be a hidden oasis somewhere. Let's look for it!
Great job, this will keep our people fed for a while.
Let's hunt for food for our army!
The city must have been rich indeed! I wonder if we can find more some other day?
I've read that a mighty city once stood here. Let's look for treasure!
These treasures were guarded lightly. Maybe there are still more secrets that this city hides from us.
We've found new areas of the ancient city to explore!
Our mightiest warriors have been defeated. We shall trade with you.
That was a good fight indeed. But I must insist on carrying out our duty, and confiscating any dangerous items.
We can't give up our goods without any payment. Our mighty boars would go hungry.
I've never seen boars that big! They must need a lot of food.
Perhaps we can come to an agreement.
Let us enter the warriors' hall then and dine while we talk. There is goblin carrot stew for all.
Thank you for your hospitality. Let's enjoy the stew!
We are heroes, enjoying our vacation. We were coming to the Goblin village to trade for supplies.
Are you trading here too? We haven't seen you before.
We are the Garrison Guard, sworn to maintain order in the land once your Free Army had driven out the Dark Lord.
We have orders to confiscate illegal fireworks and dangerous items being sold by Goblins. There have been injuries in the area.
No cutting in line! If you want our supplies, you will have to brawl for them like everyone else.
Brawl? If we must, we must.
A Portal to a new dimension is opening.
In the distance, an audience is cheering.
The tournament begins! Are you ready?
Live fast, fight hard, no regrets!
No! This is impossible! You mortals have defeated us in our own court!
Father, these heroes proved to be a match for our family...
So it seems my child. We shall get our feast the next time we meet!
You have arrived to the Court of the Vampire King.
Father, I'm hungry. Who are these intruders?
It's your lucky night my child. We'll be feasting soon!
Well, that was quite a brawl. And all of us had use for our skills!
It seems combining our powers made us stronger, after all.
We're discussing what is the absolute best way to prevail in combat.
I'd rather snipe the enemy with a cursed arrow.
Hah. Destruction is easy. But unlike you two, I bring things to life!
Whoa, watch out! The whole tavern is getting all worked up about this!
The brawl has already started! Fight!
That's a good amount of iron there, let's head back to base.
Our builders can always use more iron.

You have claimed all the dark aethers...
They are within your reach now...
You have claimed all the fire aethers...
They are within your reach now...
You have claimed all the holy aethers...
They are within your reach now...
You have claimed all the ice aethers...
They are within your reach now...
You have claimed all the nature aethers...
They are within your reach now...
You handled those Firework Rockets like veterans. Thanks to you, the new year should be protected from evil spirits.
Indeed! Our changing of the guard was dignified and joyous. This heralds a year of growth and good fortune.
I have also prepared sweet rice balls for dessert. Let them bring you abundance and joy in the coming year.
We do hope you'll come and celebrate again next year. The lanterns will guide you back to us.
Thank you both so much! We'd be delighted to take part again!
My friends, we meet again! Have you returned to celebrate the Lunar New Year with us?
Welcome to the festivities, my new friends! My name is Xiaoqing.
Thank you. We're glad to be back! Are you our master of ceremonies for the celebration?
I am, together with my friend Qinglong who has overseen the year that is now ending.
I hope you will join me in warding off evil and inviting in good luck and fortune for the next year!
We have been busy but I am glad we could make it.
It is important to find a balance between our duties and joyous festivities with friends and family.
My esteemed ally is right. Now, let's start the party and light some fireworks!
Ah! Welcome! My name is Agrafena, I'm the Superintendent Supreme.
I've been following your ascent and you have shown great promise with your skills. I am most impressed.
Lovely talent indeed. I did not believe you would actually make it to the top. You have earned our respect. See you again soon!
Great work! You really taught our students a lesson!
We're not the only ones with fancy tricks.
What brings you to the Tower of Magic?
The doors of these halls are open only for the most promising students of magic.
Do you think you've got what it takes?
Well I could give it a shot, I have always wanted to try my hand at a few spells.
Step inside and meet our mages.
Heroes from all over the island make their way back to the campsite as the hunt concludes.
So, how was the haul? Think this trip was worth it?
Could've been better, could've been worse. All in all a good run, nevertheless. I wouldn't mind coming here again.
Agreed. Working alongside everyone was great fun, too ‚Äî it's been a while since all of us gathered in one place like this.
Those Apex Monsters were much tougher than expected. If we do return, we should aim to come back better equipped.
I reckon our teamwork could use a bit of improvement as well. We probably could've navigated the island more efficiently!
True. Let's take some time to streamline our plans before the next hunt.
A remote island shrouded in mist and mystery...
So this is the hidden island! After countless failed search expeditions... we're finally here.
I reckon this place has been hidden for a good reason. I hear odd noises from the wilderness and the air reeks of danger.
Nonsense, it's YOU who reeks after several weeks on a boat!
This place is bound to be exactly the right spot for hunting both monsters and treasure!
So, you have made it past the first floors.
You are either brave or a fool...
Either way, your resolve will be tested.
I... I can feel something trying to weaken us...
It must be the curses. We should keep going.
You have potential, I give you that.
The real test begins now, let's see what you're truly made of!
You are still climbing the tower?
As if we'd ever give up!
Steel your determination, the true test awaits!
You have walked the way of the ninja...
And now you are here, despite the odds.
The Ninja Tower is back, I really want to climb it!
Our clan grows stronger and only the best can reach the top!
With each floor more treacherous than the last...
The strong will be blessed and the weak cursed into oblivion.
Wait, when did you manage to get all the way up here?
You're not supposed to know we get our powers from pizza.
I award you the title of Master Ninja. Now scram before our food gets cold!
That climb was much longer than I expected.
I am Elena and I'm searching for the wisdom of the owls.
Ah, you have come to the right place. Ask away, I'm owl ears.
I am the wisest of the owls. You could say I know it owl.
You're just saying all the owl puns you know!
This is what beak performance looks like.
You have proven capable as a warrior.
We owls seek to protect the forests and its hidden wisdom.
Now let us test your acumen. Does it match your strong sword arm?
The next challenges will be most fierce!
Your wit is keen, but we are not yet convinced.
Now graced by moonlight you shall face our true might.
You have reached the top of our hallowed tower.
And on each floor you faced a challenge set by our Parliament.
You have proven worthy of an audience, but remember that every end can also be a new beginning.
Is this the Realm of the Owls?
The owls are wise and have much knowledge of all things mystical.
Welcome to the Parliament of the Owls.
Scale our tower to meet with our elders.
But remember, we will judge you on the way.
Only the most worthy shall reach the top.
Good work. These recruits will surely help us in the times ahead.
We can find more recruits from these lands if we drive away the monsters.
Excellent. These men and women are a great addition to our army.
The people here are ready to join our cause if we help them out first.
It was an honor to fight at your side. That was so awesome!
It is not over yet. Grendel is not slain, so I will track him to his lair.
There will be time for that later. First, we will feast!
Welcome to Heorot, the mead-hall of the Danes! Let there be food and drink and tales of glorious battles!
Instead of the mighty mead-hall Heorot, you find a small camp on the moors. It shows signs of having been constructed hastily.
Welcome, noble warriors! This meal is but a meagre shadow of what it should be, but we will share what we have.
My queen speaks true. Heorot has been taken over by the monster Grendel, and we cannot toast you properly.
That is why we are here! I am Beowulf, the greatest warrior of the Geats. I will do battle with Grendel and drive him off.
Big words, but I'm not seeing much to back them up.
Watch me. Just for you, I'll even fight him hand to hand! I don't need a sword.
I'm laughing my head off! That was so much fun.
Let us perform together the next time we are in town!
Welcome to Starfall Circus, I am Director Zuri. Meet some of our esteemed performers.
Are you ready to be entertained?
We have all sorts of tricks prepared for you...
Let us see how well you can handle them.
Hansel! You're here as well! I'm so glad I found you.
Sister! I've been looking for you!
At least they found each other. I have to say, this has been weird. I never knew there were other worlds...
Aye, young lass. Let us share this fine treasure and go look for more!
You all are rather peculiar, but I'm still fond of you.
So it seems our realms got mixed up. It was a delight to meet you all and see your worlds.
Yarr, there be loot to be plundered in this new world. Wait, where are we, to be precise?
Who are you supposed to be and are we not in Wonderland?
Wonderland? Quit your tomfoolery, miss. I have never heard of such place!
I must have taken a wrong turn at some point... Has anyone seen my sister?
Listen everyone, I think our realms have gotten mixed up somehow...
And so the madrigal of mayhem ends...
No matter! We will return! Next time we'll be unstoppable!
Great work, everyone! You all are worthy of being called Slayers.
No idea what that means, but it sounds better than "League of Villains".
I was hasty to judge you, clown. You fight well.
You're not too bad yourself. You would kill it on the flying trapeze!
I agree! Welcome to our troupe!
I have gathered the vilest villains from all corners of...
Wait. This isn't Karemdol. Where are we?
I should have known that joining you would be a waste of time!
Hey, cool outfits you got there. Are you here for the audition?
The green one could be a fortune-teller. Wait, where's our tent?
Who are you and what on earth happened to your head?
And yet he's still on his feet. I've never met such a worthy challenger!
Hmph. I'd rather not stoop down to the level of a clown.
And so the madrigal of mayhem begins...
Impossible. Our stoneskin cannot be pierced...
Yet your weapons have managed to do so. How thrilling!
Well, I have had a lot of practice smashing things with this hammer.
Or maybe all that standing still outside in the rain has made you two weaker?
A possibility, to be sure. Regardless, you truly are remarkable fighters.
Loath as I am to admit it, these mortals may be our equals in combat.
Sorry about the mess, though. We didn't mean to smash that spire.
No matter. It would not be this structure's first restoration... or even the second.
Feel free to return in the future. We look forward to being challenged again.
I wonder what secrets may lie hidden inside this old cathedral!
It's uncanny how we keep running into new locations to explore.
Who dares disturb our slumber? Your intrusion is most unwelcome.
Indeed. Yet I am also intrigued. Few mortals have ever breached our sanctuary.
Ech... I knew that the spooky sculpture in the garden was bad luck.
Wait. I think she looks just like that sinister statue outside. See those horns?
I AM that statue! Have you never seen a Gargoyle? What grotesque ignorance.
Agreed. Perhaps we should show them how impenetrable our stone skin is.
This cathedral looks a lot like the one we visited before.
True, this one just looks more...mossy.
Oh no, someone has entered our peaceful home.
I knew it! Those creepy gargoyles again...
Oh no, now the intruders also talk.
I'm sorry, my friend here is sort of an introvert. Unlike the rest of us.
Let me guess... this all ends up in a big challenge like last time?
That was an amazing carnival! A bit exhausting, but I had a really great time.
I agree! Hopefully we'll be able to come back next, uh... whenever the next carnival is.
I'd love to come in another costume next time! But I wonder whether we'll be able to come here again.
Fortunately, there is no need to worry. You all are fated to visit this place again.
That's great news! Could you also tell us when that will be?
You will be summoned here when the time is right. One might call it... a fated summon.
One may NOT! That means something else. Please stop misleading these mortals.
I didn't really get that one, but anyway, thanks for showing us around.
See you again, then ‚Äî sometime soon!
Wow. I have no idea how we got here, but this place looks absolutely gorgeous!
Yes. And it looks like the streets are gearing up for a festival of some sort...
Greetings, travellers. You are a perceptive lot. This city's famed carnival starts tomorrow.
I can barely conceal my excitement.
I would say your mask is concealing your excitement quite well.
Looks like we've arrived just in time!
Wait, you two are both wearing masks. Do we need masks to take part? Oh no...
Heed her not ‚Äî she speaks in jest. All attending gods will be masked, but mortals are free to join without one.
...and that's the story of Hachiko, the Puppy of Loyalty, as told by Max the Storyteller!
Or that's how it was told to me when I was a wee duckling. It's quite an old tale, apparently.
Quite a tearjerker. Makes me think of my old caretakers. Thanks for sharing it, Waddles.
My pleasure, Ribbit. It's one of my favorites, even though I get a bit jealous of dogs when I tell it.
I understand. Ducks don't have it easy here. Somebody shoots rubber pellets at you every now and then, right?
Once every fortnight or so, like clockwork. And they always aim for exactly 10 of us... none of us know why.
They better have a really good reason for doing so. If not, we should let them learn the power of mighty pets!
I'm afraid not. But the next expedition might yield some answers! I'll set out again tomorrow.
It's been many years now. There must be better things for you to do. Maybe it's time to call it quits?
No way. I'm sure he's still trying to make it back to our meeting point. It's just a matter of time.
As dedicated as ever, I see. I say a statue should be raised in honor of your loyalty!
Nah, that sounds silly. What good would a statue of me do, anyway?
Well, I was speaking in jest... But come to think of it ‚Äî if we place one at the meeting point...
Even if you're not there when he gets back, he'll know that you've been waiting. Wouldn't that be nice?
Wait, that sounds brilliant! Thanks Max, you're a genius!
I'm sure one will be raised when more people learn of you. The world could always use more mighty pets.
I can see the door again, but the Entertainers are blocking the way. It seems they will never let us leave and my sword weighs a ton already.

‚ô´ You've seen our faces here ‚ô´
                                        ‚ô´ But do not fear ‚ô´
                                        ‚ô´ I'll give the masks you've found ‚ô´
                                        ‚ô´ They're yours to wear...‚ô´
Look! They are retreating, forming a pathway.

‚ô´ Your courage and our might in one combined ‚ô´
                                         ‚ô´ The secrets of the Opera are here ‚ô´
                                         ‚ô´ Within your mind ‚ô´
That was an ordeal! I think I've had my share of fine arts for a while.
Wow! I didn't know we had such an awesome Opera House. I need to tell Vivica about this!
Nice place you got here Elena, but be careful. I've heard about this place. It is full of secrets and the word is that it's haunted... and I can hear eerie singing.

‚ô´ Come, join us in our halls ‚ô´
                                           ‚ô´ In dreams we sing ‚ô´
                                           ‚ô´ Our voices call to you ‚ô´
                                           ‚ô´ And speak thy name ‚ô´
Who are you, fair singer? We mean you no harm.

‚ô´ Are you in dream or wake ‚ô´
                                           ‚ô´ For now you'll find ‚ô´
                                           ‚ô´ The secrets of the Opera are here ‚ô´
                                           ‚ô´ Within your mind ‚ô´
Someone is moving in the shadows. Get ready!

‚ô´ You sing again with us ‚ô´
                                           ‚ô´ Our great sonnet ‚ô´
                                           ‚ô´ Our influence on you ‚ô´
                                           ‚ô´ Takes hold and yet ‚ô´

‚ô´ Where you turn, look for me ‚ô´
                                           ‚ô´ And  glance around ‚ô´
                                           ‚ô´ The secrets of the Opera are here ‚ô´
                                           ‚ô´ Within your mind ‚ô´
Looks like the doors behind us have disappeared. No choice, but to venture further into the Opera House...
In the name of Crom! Our opponent still stands!
I was hasty to judge you. Perhaps one should never underestimate their opponents.
You are worthy of being called a Slayer.
Come find us if you ever wish to hunt some monsters... or test your strength!
We will train tirelessly until our next encounter.
Far and wide, we have searched for a worthy challenger...
Saoirse turns towards you, eyeing you dismissively.
Looks like we have to keep looking. This one clearly doesn't have what it takes to survive a battle with us.
I will take on any opponent that has the bravery to face me.
I should have known that joining this League would be a waste of time!
Such incompetence. If only I had been the leader, we would have crushed the heroes with ease.
...hmm, it seems the League of Villains is not operating to its full potential quite yet...
No matter! We will return! Next time we'll be unstoppable!
Well well...it's good to be back in business. The business of evil!
I have gathered the vilest villains from all corners of Karemdol...
...and the League of Villains will be unstoppable under my control!
Why should WE bow to YOU? I should be the one in charge, with the might of nature at my command!
You puny little garden plant! I could freeze your roots within an instant...
I will show you all my true power. Let's find some "heroes" to slay!
I think that's all for now. Let's return some other day for another look.
Let's check out the shore. Who knows what the tide has brought in.
That jewel! It belongs to us. Hand it over!
It's from the Devil Reef, isn't it? Take us there, and I'll think about it.
Atwood, I like taking risks, but your curiosity might put us in grave danger. These cultists are way too forthcoming.
Dolores, we are Investigators. We don't shy away from danger when uncovering a mystery.
The Jewel of the Deep is glowing. The rumors about the Deep ones in the area are true.
Something is not right. Where are all the villagers?
Your pendant. It's glowing as well!
That's a bad omen. Something very evil is lurking here.
Atwood and Dolores suddenly feel an overwhelming rush of insanity consuming their minds.
Hysteria. Don't break the investigators' minds just yet. They might not be ready.
A little insanity never hurt anybody...
Oh, we are pretty familiar with it.
Shall we put that to the test?
Devout of the Deep! Show these Investigators the true meaning of insanity in the name of the Old Ones!
How did it feel to embrace insanity?
It felt like home. Can we leave now?
Only after giving us the jewel!
About that. I just wanted to collect data about its origin.
Dolores opens her locket, and suddenly, a portal appears. Atwood and Dolores jump inside it and disappear.
Unexpected, but we got what we wanted.
Well done bringing them here. Our master can touch the dark corners of their minds now.
Haha! They clearly have no idea what that jewel is!
They don't know what it is. Let's keep it that way.
It's rude to whisper in front of others.
Who would have thought a lighthouse would be the door to a realm infested with eldritch horrors.
A warning. Unless you embrace the insanity, you won't survive.
How kind of you to warn us.
Suddenly, a dark form twisting and turning emerges from the sea and takes shape.
Follow me. May insanity guide us.
We are lucky that the dragon flew away. It acted like it was possessed!
But who could do something like this?
Look! It left behind traces of dark magical dust.
With it's compounds I can create a counter spell for us.
Good call! Maybe we can help these dragons.
Heroes are tracking traces of recent mysterious attacks on the mountains.
There you are! We have been waiting for you. Let our quest begin!
Did you see those claw marks on the way? Looks like we might be tracking a dragon!
What an exiting case indeed. Let's see where these traces lead us!
Dragons are finally free from the dark curse and back to their normal selves.
Curse you heroes for releasing the mighty dragons from my command!
Dark Lord disappears into the darkness.
Thank you for saving us from the dire curse.
If you ever need extra fire power, come find us.
I can't wait to brag about this at the tavern!
The curse is getting too strong, this whole land is in chaos.
Look! There are the remaining dragons!
I still need some time to compose a strong enough spell for all of them.
You're back to your senses, this means our spell must have worked!
You may have saved this one, but my army is of many.
Soon I will have this whole world in my hands.
We need to find rest of the cursed dragons before the curse consumes their spirits!
We are on the edge of the dragon territory. Stay alert!
But the traces end here. Which way now?
Suddenly ominous sounds echo from distance and tremble the ground.
You actually made it! I can't believe it. Thank you so much!
No problem. We're glad to see you alive! How long have you been here?
I don't know what date it is now... but I entered the tower on the 25th of March.
Wow, so you've been stuck in here for ages! No, wait... Hmm. Okay, so ‚Äî
That's not important, Richard. Come on, Dante, let's get back home!
Of course. Hey, wait! Isn't this way going further down?
You must be really tired. Don't worry, this is the right direction. We're heading up.
Now you will row... against the current... Far more danger... lies ahead...
Incredible. Very few mortals manage to clamber back up from the eternal night.
I will see to it that your efforts are rewarded. My children will have learned much from you.
My apologies, dear mother... But rest assured... More will come... and most will stay...
That really doesn't bode well, does it?
Yet for some reason, I feel like we might end up coming here again.
Anyhow, thanks for showing us around, Charon! See you.
The group exit the tower ‚Äî and find the overworld draped with the scintillant night sky.
And so we emerge, to see ‚Äî once more ‚Äî the stars...
Right. Now to find the person we came to rescue.
I'm beginning to worry Dante might not have survived. Nothing's edible here!
Tell me about it. I'm starving!
Worry not... He has been kept fed... For a price...
You make everything sound so ominous! But please lead us to him.
Welcome, surface-dwellers... to Styx... I shall be... your guide...
Wait, I think I've seen you before. Weren't you some kind of merchant?
Surely not... Now let us proceed... Dangers lie ahead... I will ferry you safely...
Welcome, surface-dwellers... to Styx... I shall be... your guide...
Wait, I think I've seen you before. Weren't you some kind of merchant?
Surely not... Now let us proceed... Dangers lie ahead... I will ferry you safely...
From here on... the currents change... A different danger...
I will again take... some of your SOULs... for safekeeping...
If I do not... they may end up paying... a far higher price...
From here on... the currents change... A different danger...
I will again take... some of your SOULs... for safekeeping...
If I do not... they may end up paying... a far higher price...
This is your destination... The center of the underworld...
Right. Now to find the person we came to rescue.
I'm beginning to worry Dante might not have survived. Nothing's edible here!
Tell me about it. I'm starving!
Worry not... He has been kept fed... For a price...
You make everything sound so ominous! But please lead us to him.
So this is the Tower of Styx.
But it's only one story tall! Why is it called a tower?
Maybe this "Dante" person could explain, once we find and rescue him.
I've never read such a long letter for help. But it was very beautifully written.
Eh, I hate reading long things. I could finish only about the first third of it.
An inscription on the gate reads: "ABANDON ALL HOPE, YE WHO ENTER HERE"
That doesn't bode well, does it? I hope Dante didn't write that...
Surely not. Come on, let's go.
The three heroes pass through the gate ‚Äî and unwittingly enter the underworld.
Wow, it's just circles all the way down. So this is why it's called a tower!
Yes, Roc, I also hope the explorers enjoyed their stay.
As night turns to day, so shall my empire hide away.
We shall meet again when the time is right!
The Empire of Sand is well-hidden.
Not many have witnessed our castle emerging from the sand.
Now that you have found us here, you may explore the secrets of the Empire of Sand.
That is true, my dearest Roc. The explorers need to watch their step.
You crushed us like a true barbarian!
Some trials require patience, cunning and tactics.
Here we throw all that away.  You better brace yourself and RAGE!
Yes that truly was a test! I shouldn't have expected less!
Time to see if you are a master cleric. It would be a source of glee to see you flee.
Well done! You truly are one with the nature.
One must be in tune with nature to best these trials. Show proper respect and you might make it.
Congratulations Commander! You honor us with your prowess.
Commander! Welcome! You will find no quarter given here.
Yes! Only a true fighter can prosper in these trials! Time to draw your sword!
You are in harmony with yourself. Very Good.
A masterful monk is in perfect harmony with their inner powers. It's time to test your training.
Commander, evil had no hold on you. You truly are a devoted Paladin!
Duty! Justice! And Honor! Time to test your Paladin Oath!
That was incredible Commander! It seems that you could have done that with our eyes closed.
Pff. Lucky shot. I could have done it with all my four arms crossed.
Here lies a challenge for a true marksman! May your aim be true commander.
I doubt you can even use a bow.
How did this happen? I didn't even see you move.
You fooled us all. We underestimated your artful trickery.
This trial will test your limits. A truly masterful Rogue uses cunning and speed to overcome any challenge.
We are too fast for you. You wont see us until it is too late.
You are a truly masterful sorcerer if I ever saw one!
Such power! Such sheer will and determination!
Wizard think all magic is learned, but all sorcerers know true magic is something you are born with.
This is a trial for a true sorcerer and not just some... Wizard!
That was an exquisite display of magic Commander! I almost got burned by all that magic.
The arcane arts suit you. We might even call you an equal.
Mastering the art of magic requires deep study of the arcane. This separates us from the sorcerers who wield magic without finesse.
I doubt your dedication is enough for this trial.
You were....less weak than I expected.
Now now Zengar, I think that's not quite accurate. Their performance merits more recognition, wouldn't you agree?
...congratulations. You were strong enough to face the perils of elemental space.
Indeed. And we do hope to see you again!
So, you're the weaklings trying their luck in Contest of Elements?
Zengar, don't be rude. These contestants may well be worth our time.
Bah. They look puny and weak. They're unfit for the challenges of elemental space.
Looks can be deceiving. Let us start the Contest and see just how strong these heroes are!
Whoa, the heroes did good! They beat us fair and square!
Much respect, I'd say! They totally anticipated our every move.
It was fun though. We have to see how they do against the next element soon.
I wouldn't miss it for the world! See you later heroes!
Well hello there! Welcome to Contest of Elements, heroes!
The Elemental Space is a radical place...are you sure you're ready for it?
Ready or not, sister, these heroes can't back out anymore.
Right you are! Let's see how they fare against us!
We were bested, fair and square.
It was a hundred...no, two hundred years ago when this happened last time!
And it's most invigorating! Clash of swords and sizzle of spells are music to my ears!
Heh, Griffex in a lively mood is truly a rare occurrence.
Thank you for this, adventurers, and fare well in your travels.
Grumble...grumble...what am I going to do with these manuscripts? It's all nonsense. Nonsense I say!
Hey, Griffex. Snap out of it. We've got visitors.
Yes, and they claim to have already sailed across the vastness of Elemental Space.
Is that right? Hmph. Well, let's see how they fare against us.
That's the spirit! We need to focus, these heroes are no pushovers.
Very impressive. You heroes weren't fragile or careless, after all.
Quite so, Doxan. The elemental space is merciless to those without merit...
But you heroes did not even flinch when facing the challenge!
We'll be seeing you again, heroes!
So, heroes, you've decided to board the galactic galleon?
Are you certain you can handle this? You look somewhat...fragile.
I agree, Ignazio. They look like they could fall off the ship at any moment.
The currents of elemental space have claimed many careless lives.
Though I've heard rumors that they have already visited our friends around the elemental space.
Is that the case? Well then, this should prove to be interesting.
Very impressive. You sailed the elemental currents...and survived.
But know that there is much more to see in the vastness of space.
Next time, who knows what dangers you shall face.
We hope to see you again in the Contest of Elements!
Welcome to Contest of Elements, heroes.
You're very far from your home. The elemental space is a dangerous place for those unaccustomed to it.
We hope you're strong enough to travel aboard the galaxy galleon...
...and that you can withstand the challenges before you!
Our scouts spotted a Red Dragon guarding the mountain pass.
We must prepare. Let's train [#!]Heroes[#] out of the [#!]Recruits[#] we gained!
There is one more thing to do. Let's build a [#!]Forge[#] to craft helpful items for battle!
The Towers of Windemer... We must seize them to keep Dark Lord at bay.
Keep training, building and leveling up. Those Towers will be ours!
Way to go! You completed every single plan we had!
The [#!]Stronghold[#] is prospering, and the first [#!]Provinces[#] are free. Commander, you are ready to take it from here!
I have faith in you, [#!]Commander[#]. Let's push forward!
Next time, maybe it's better to hit a chest once before trying to open it.
Next time, maybe it's better to hit a chest once before trying to open it.

I like this place. Cupid fights are fun!
Now I remember! I LOVE this place!
That's the spirit! We hope you can stay for a while~
We need to get going, unfortunately.
Aww... But you are always welcome back for another Cupid fight!
Thanks! We'll be back next year!
I swear this place looks familiar to me. I have been here before.
I have never visited this place before, I'm sure of it.
Oh, he sure gets lost often.
Eros smirks. He draws an Arrow of Desire and points it towards Richard.
I suddenly feel the desire to...
Am I hearing a request for a Cupid fight?!
Fighting the monsters here is great practice!
Noctur! It's time for our Monster Mash! Who defeats more monsters wins!
You never learn. I haven't lost this competition to you in over 50 years now.
Today is the day that I win!
So, how does it feel to lose yet again?
Well, I'll win the next 100 years, so it doesn't matter.
Haha, you are such an optimist. Don't ever change.
If I were an optimist, I would have said I'd win for the next 1000 years!
Woah! There is a dragon flying in the eye of the storm!
Stormcaller notices Richard and flies directly to him.
You seem intrigued about the storm. Do you want to fly with me?
Sure, I fear nothing! Nothing dangerous about flying in a thunderstorm, right?
Richard hops on Stormcaller's back, and they fly high into the swirling dark clouds.
Wow, I felt the thunder rattling my armor!
Storms make flying way more interesting!
My name is Stormcaller. Do you wanna fly again on the next storm?
Sure! I'm Richard, but flying in the storm made me feel like the god of thunder!
Looks like Stormcaller is forming a bond with Richard.
Blaze! I see some trouble ahead! Be careful!
Blaze is suddenly surrounded by many enraged monsters.
This monster swarm is way bigger than usual!
I don't know why, but I'm suddenly growing weaker.
It's the weather. There is something off about it. Let's try working together!
I didn't know heroes could fight like that! Thank you for saving my tail!
I'm glad you're okay. Protecting someone else brings out the best in us.
The skies of Dragonspire seem unstable. Is that why there are so many monsters and odd weather?
Yes. A long time ago, dragons and heroes made each other stronger by working together.
But it's been more like an invisible bond for too long. Many dragons have lost faith in heroes.
I see... Faith is powerful as it keeps a light in our hearts.
It is intriguing how the bond between dragons and heroes can have such an impact on the weather.
Huh, it's suddenly growing dark quickly...
Suddenly, Vivica sees an intense light emanating through the murky forest.
Hey, you, follow my light! This dusk is treacherous!
Thank you for lighting the way through the dark! I'm Vivica.
I'm Lux, the keeper of the light.
I'd like to ask you something personal, Lux.
Have you forged a bond with a hero?
Sadly, I have not. I've heard it's something like a friendship that lasts a lifetime.
Noctur! I just met one of the heroes who arrived at Dragonspire.
Her name is Elena. Maybe I'll finally forge a Dragon Bond like you!
She is a great fighter! I could learn a thing or two from her.
You're a mighty dragon. What can a human teach you about fighting?
We will see! But I already feel stronger. I'll show you!
See! I fought a lot better! It could be the Dragon Bond.
Elena helped me when the odd weather made me weaker.
Also, an unusual horde of monsters surrounded me.
Are you telling me a human saved you, a mighty dragon?
Well, I just said I was feeling weaker and surrounded!
I was lucky Elena was there.
Noctur, what's the matter? I can sense immense sadness within you.
Noctur, slow down! You know you can tell me anything.
Noctur flies away as fast as he can, and Blaze follows him.
Blaze, go back home to Dragonspire!
No! I'm not going home without you.
Suddenly, Noctur turns sharply, slams into Blaze to slow him down, and vanishes into the thick clouds.
Suddenly, the mist starts to get thicker. Blaze flies frantically, looking for his friend.
I have to find him quickly. This mist is freezing my wings.
I have never seen Noctur this upset.
I was talking about Elena when I suddenly sensed something shift within him.
Maybe something happened to his hero. Something terrible.
Blaze flies towards Serpent Mountain and sees a flash of gold and green between the cliffs.
That must be a dragon! Hello! Is someone here?
Hello, young one. What are you doing this far out of Dragonspire?
I'm looking for a friend. Have you seen a mean-looking purple dragon with a heart of gold?
Suddenly, a horde of venomous serpents attack Blaze and Marmora!
The magical balance around Dragonspire is getting worse.
Everything is getting more deadly out here.
I didn't see your friend, but I sensed a distraught dragon fly by towards Mount Oblivion.
I advise you to turn back, young one. It's too dangerous to venture so far alone.
Thank you for the help and advice, but I can't give up on my friend.
This place looks more deserted than usual. I can't even sense any birds close by.
That's because I've made sure of that!
Blaze senses Bonefang's bloodthirst and prepares to defend himself.
I'm just passing by. Have you seen any dragon fly through here?
